entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Rain mixed with light wet snow early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 6.
